And now for a quick post from the “road.”

I’m currently chillin’ in Midtown Atlanta with the illustrious Ms Stephens. Last night was a blast; we met up with Rob, Trey, Robert, Grace, Leilah, and her friend Emily. We then went out for a “night on the town,” so to speak. Dinner at the Spaghetti Factory, then a salsa dancing at some little place (I forgot the name), finally topped off with a drag show at Hoedowns. Oh and I got to see The Lady Chablis. I really wish I’d gotten a picture with her.

Today we’ve done lunch at Fresh to Order and some shopping at Lenox mall. I have no clue what the evening holds.

Anyway, I’m off for more adventures.
